name: Drop-In: Tater Tots
description: The Tater Tot Playtime program is designed for children aged 2 to 5, this drop-in playgroup provides a safe and stimulating environment for little ones to explore, interact, and make new friends. Tots must be accompanied by an adult to ensure a fun and engaging experience with age-appropriate toys and games. Additionally, on Thursdays, Tater Tot collaborates with the SF Public Library to offer a special bilingual story time, adding an enriching cultural dimension to our program.

howToGetIt: Please go to the Garfield Playground at the activity start time
keywords: we are a family with children under 18 years old.
